title: But you're a girl
creator_contributor_role: Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Women in television
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Discrimination in employment
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Women in politics
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Women - Employment
description: Shows some of the areas girls have traditionally worked in are no longer certain providers of jobs and then goes on to look at other job options such as trades, apprenticeships and traditionally male dominated professions. Indicates that is is possible for girls and young women to enter these areas, do well in them and enjoy them.
